projects.title: A Low-profile Haptic Interface Based on Surface Electrical Nerve Stimulation for Teleoperation
projects.impact: Low-profile wearable electrical stimulation haptics for teleoperation and VR.
outcomes: Designed a compact, wearable stimulation interface compatible with optical hand tracking.
Demonstrated spatially congruent fingertip sensation without impeding manipulation.

projects.title: Artificial Touch Feedback Through Skin-surface Electrical Stimulation for VR Applications
projects.impact: Electrical stimulation feedback mapped to VR interactions for more informative touch.
outcomes: Prototyped stimulation-driven haptic feedback for immersive interaction.
Built reproducible experimental workflows for human-subject evaluation.

projects.title: Treatment and Assessment of Ocular Disorders Through VR Games
projects.impact: VR-based assessment and training tools for ocular disorders in clinical workflows.
outcomes: Delivered Unity-based diagnostics and rehabilitation tools integrating eye tracking.
Implemented IRB-compliant protocols and clinician-facing workflows.

projects.title: Operator Centric Design of a Teleoperation System
projects.impact: Multimodal immersive teleoperation system design and evaluation lessons learned.
outcomes: Built a low-latency teleoperation interface combining VR, audio, and haptics.
Documented system architecture and operator-centric design decisions.

projects.title: E-Stim for Educators workshop
projects.impact: Hands-on workshop exploring sensing and stimulation in education.

projects.title: The Benefits of a Virtual Reality Lab Over a Lab Manual
projects.impact: Virtual labs to improve engagement and learning outcomes.

projects.title: Honors Institute App
projects.impact: Mobile app for program communication and events.

projects.title: Voice-activated inventory for illiterate mechanics
projects.impact: Voice-first inventory UX for low-literacy environments.

projects.title: VR Physics
projects.impact: Interactive physics learning experiences in VR.

projects.title: Other Projects
projects.impact: A collection of additional work and experiments.
